mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.title, m.description, m.category_id AS categoryId, m.img, m.create_time AS createTime, m.update_time AS updateTime, m.src, m.singer, m.size, m.time, m.hits, m.comments, m.status, m.is_delete, m.user_id AS userId, u.username, u.header_pic AS headerPic FROM music m LEFT JOIN category c ON c.id = m.category_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.userid = m.user_id WHERE m.id = #{id}

SELECT count(1) FROM music
and name LIKE '%${keyword}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music( title, description, category_id, img, src, singer, hits, comments, loves, status, is_delete, user_id, username, header_pic ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{categoryId}, #{img}, #{src}, #{singer}, #{hits}, #{comments}, #{loves}, #{status}, #{isDelete}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{headerPic} )
mapper.delete: update music set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id}
